body_html:
I agree there are two problems: divbyzero signal handling and implicit type casting.

But the second one is important as well: if implicit casting is supported, it should not lead to such severe type demotion and divbyzero.
body_text:
I agree there are two problems: divbyzero signal handling and implicit type casting.
But the second one is important as well: if implicit casting is supported, it should not lead to such severe type demotion and divbyzero.
body:
I agree there are two problems: divbyzero signal handling and implicit type casting.

But the second one is important as well: if implicit casting is supported, it should not lead to such severe type demotion and divbyzero.
